{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Kingston |model=MobileLite Wireless |revision=G1 (MLW221) |upc=611104406065 |asin=B00CEB5QU2 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WMTM-169GN |type=mobile NAS |fcc_id=ZME-MLW221 |fcc_date=02/07/2013 |ic_id=3880B-MLW221 |pcb_id=WMTM-169GN |flags=SD Card slot |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620N;MT7620N, 1248-BMSL, CTPNB173; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL128PIF |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT46V32M16CY-5B IT |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620N;MT7620N, 1248-BMSL, CTPNB173; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |802dot11_protocols=bgn |addl_chips=4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; ,,, USB 2.0 SD/MMC Flash Card Reader IC;Genesys Logic;GL823;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |oui=00:26:B7 |oui_eth=00:26:B7 }} {{TagLine|Kingston MobileLite Wireless G1}} :[https://www.kingston.com/us/wireless/wireless_readers/mlw221 Product page] {{•}} [http://www.kingston.com/datasheets/mlw221_us.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [http://www.kingston.com/us/landing/widriveplus Firmware (Beta)]
"WMTM-169GN_WiFi_V01 is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Gemtek]] WMTM-169GN Presumed 00:26:87 OUI based on the FCC label.
===Hardware specifications=== *CPU: ''[[MediaTek]]'' MT7620N @580MHz (MIPS 24KEc) :802.11bgn (2T2R) WiSoC, used 1x antenna/streams *RAM: 64MB (DDR2 SDRAM) *Storage: 16MB (Serial Flash) *Battery: 1810mAh 3.8V (Li-ion)
===Links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/kingston/mlw221 ''Kingston MobileLite Wireless MLW221'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N 802.11bgn (1T1R) • [http://wiki.openwrt.org/_media/media/mlw221-03.jpg 150Mbps] :Flash: ''Spansion'' S25FL129P1 (16MB) :RAM: ''Hynix'' H5PS5162GFR (64MB) :WAN : 1x FE (100Mbps), Serial mod :Li-ion 1810mAh 3.8V [https://openwrt.org/_detail/media/kingston/mlw221-01.jpg battery]
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=48401 ''Kingston G1 (MLW221)'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :''MobileLite Wireless'' G1 & [http://www.kingston.com/us/wireless/wireless_readers/mlwg2 G2] ([http://up.picr.de/19745980tv.jpg PCB]) :G1 - Li-ion 1810mAh 3.8V battery :G2 - Li-ion 4640mAh 3.8V battery
